description:
Transform generic error messages into actionable guidance with specific fix buttons. For validation errors, highlight exact fields and provide one-click corrections where possible.

**Rationale:** Generic error messages leave users stuck without knowing how to proceed. Users waste time guessing solutions or abandon tasks entirely. Specific guidance reduces support burden and improves task completion.
title: Guided Error Recovery with Specific Fix Actions
